bill.title: Enacts the economic development program evaluation act and prescribes the functions and purposes of the special evaluation program bond act; requires state agencies involved in economic development activities to prepare an annual comprehensive evaluation of their programs; repeals "implementation of the jobs for the new New York bond act" which is to prepare a plan for each economic development program.
bill.description: Enacts the economic development program evaluation act and prescribes the functions and purposes of the special evaluation program bond act; requires state agencies involved in economic development activities to prepare an annual comprehensive evaluation of their programs; repeals "implementation of the jobs for the new New York bond act" which is to prepare a plan for each economic development program.
